website_summaries.verdict: Available in a slew of colors, the Gemini 3 is a great everyday trainer.
pros: The Gemini 3 offers exceptional breathability, comfort, and support in an attractive package
The interior liner is great at wicking moisture and there's enough cushioning to pad each step and provide support
cons: Fit is a little narrow and shoe is not available in wide widths

customer_reviews.title: Another disappointing Under Armour shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They'll win style points all day long, but if you're looking for something practical, this is not the way to go. I had a great experience with the very first version of the Gemini and it's cushion. This version is far worse and irritates your back ankle if you're not careful. The original Gemini shoe was very good for distance running. This one is far from it. I guess it's okay if you're just trying to lift weights at the gym, but you'll need socks that can protect the back of your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taggart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort not as good as prior Gemini line
customer_reviews.text: I swear by the Gemini 2’s. So comfortable and made so well that they actually helped with knee and hip discomfort. These are not as well made in my opinion. My legs and knees hurt terribly after wearing these sneakers. The more I wore them the more they hurt. Went back to the Gemini 2’s and instantly started feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: Daddyo

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, but Gemini 2 wins the day
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Under armor Gemini 2 sneakers so I took a chance with these Gemini 3 series. They are comfortable but not as great as the previous Gemini 2. They are less attractive and have less heel support. I want to love them, but they just cant hang with the previous version. Buy the old Gemini 2 if you can find them.
customer_reviews.author: David Mazakas

customer_reviews.title: Another Under Armour WIN!!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and the quality is exactly what you'd expect from Under Armour. These shoes protect your feet very well from injury which is great for distance running. However I noticed my feet getting hot like the material wasn't breathing and also initial break in I noticed the tongue of the shoes to rub enough to make my upper foot/lower leg area sore. After the third run there didn't seem to be an issue. Another win for Under Armour.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and super cool. I have a few Under Armour shoes and every one I have bought I buy a 1/2 size up from my normal size. If blind buying a suggest you also try 1/2 size up or go into a store to get your size fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well made and super comfortable. Great for the gym. I don't know that I would use these for any long distance running but they are great for my HITT workouts in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned, yet light
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Been nursing a knee injury for a few months, that turns out was due to poor shoes. Got these and now no pain! Shoes fit comfortably with plenty of cushion, but also are much lighter than expected. Plenty of spring from the shoe. Planning on buying at least one more pair!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable shoe. I really enjoy running in these. The laces get nice and tight. These are truly wonderful to walk around in and work out In. I have already logged over 20 miles in a couple short weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jack WA

customer_reviews.title: Ran too large.
customer_reviews.text: I sold them to a friend because they didn't fit like other pairs of similar UA running shoes I've purchased in the recent past. (I have 9 pairs of UA running shoes from this year)
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Hatfield Jr

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable I am a true under armour shoe fan now
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 pairs of Nikes before these. I had the metcon 4s and metcon frees. They both fell apart within three months. The metcon free actually had a problem with the sole after 3 weeks. Each pair cost $130!!! You would expect a solid shoe that can last. So far I love these under armours. They fit great and are light.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! But the 13 was to small I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! But the 13 was to small I should have gotten a 14. My husband may not get to wear them long 🙁 they were meant for work and everyday wearing but they are not working for him in that way he’s had 2 knee surgeries and these aren’t helping at all.
customer_reviews.author: AJones

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! I've run in them a few times already, this is the first pair of shoes which didn't require a break in for me. Once these wear out, I'm likely to get the same pair to replace. Thanks Under Armor for designing a great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great and fit well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black shoes. The shoes that I received were red and black. The shoes are great and fit well. However, I wish I would have received what I ordered. I understand I can return the shoes. However, time will not allow for me to exercise that option!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: No Heel Notch
customer_reviews.text: Beware - there is no heel notch which means you may get a degree of irritation on your Achilles heel as you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Both of us love them great fit true to size very comfortable for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son after owning a woman's pair myself. Both of us love them great fit true to size very comfortable for long durations of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lovnthecaps

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes! My fiance loves them and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, durable shoes. I've had Gemini 2 UA for a long time, and these do not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Lemonjello

customer_reviews.title: On Eur 45 size was good and wide enough for him
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my father. He has gout and wide feet. On Eur 45 size was good and wide enough for him. But from back above heel it is not so soft as normal sneakers are and he not wearing them to walk only to car. Price is big for this kind of quality
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Thanks these were delivered just as they were described. The soles are a little harder than I expected, but maybe after they are worn in it will be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice look. UA has some good stuff going for ...
customer_reviews.text: a little large, but my kid loves them. Nice look. UA has some good stuff going for them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable tennis I've ever used, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars or should i say toes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! What I've been looking for. Light and look way better in person! Happy feet for sure. And the price was even better!!! ☺
customer_reviews.author: CapsCupChamps18

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning and support. Really helped me increase my distance without foot pain. Nice cushion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No collar padding
customer_reviews.text: Feels great once you break into.. only complaint i have is the collat is not padded and pinches a little.. great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Max_pgh

customer_reviews.title: Orherwise they were so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe comes up to far on my heel. After wearing them two days, I had blisters on both of my heels. I had to return them. Orherwise they were so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Loutzenhiser

customer_reviews.title: they stay comfortable all day
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes to work and when I'm running around in general and my feet never hurt, they stay comfortable all day, quality made shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mechler

customer_reviews.title: ... are cut very differently and do not fit as comfortably as the previous 2
customer_reviews.text: These are cut very differently and do not fit as comfortably as the previous 2.1 version.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe, put on many miles with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fits as expected and better price than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fits as expected and better price than in store.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: They came earlier than expected and fit my son to size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker in grey that is perfect for a work out and can be dressed up or down. We
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, feels great. Nice and light. I just got them, but so far I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sixpack

customer_reviews.title: Already had a pair of these and love them. The size 10 I have fit better ...
customer_reviews.text: Already had a pair of these and love them. The size 10 I have fit better than these but they're usable. I love these shoes for running very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Klay Kimple

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt a great running shoe but half a size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bowman

customer_reviews.title: No good feeling of support or comfort
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'm going to order these shoes again. No good feeling of support or comfort :(
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but did give me blisters on both feet!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable shoes for walking/general activity
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable shoes for walking/general activity. I would not recommend these for any kind of traction activity like basketball, or running. This is more of a leisure/walking shoe in my opinion. They just dont "grab" your feet even when fully tightened and laced, and I never really feel like my foot is sticking in the shoe. When playing basketball my feet seem to slide on the bottom of the shoes, but this may just be because they are new. Other new shoes have not performed like this. Comfortable general purpose shoe, but I do not personally recommend for sports or traction type activities.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Kick Distance Spike Running Shoe
product_meta.description: RUNNING STYLE: Ultra-cushioned, neutral shoe designed to deliver unmatched comfort. Innovative UA SpeedFormconstruction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction. Threadborne midfoot panel provides structure & distinct style. Engineered mesh used on the tongue & toe box to enhance fit & increase ventilation. Internal heel counter provides seamless, lightweight support & structure. Embedded sockliner for added cushioning, support & seamless comfort. Charged Cushioningmidsole uses compressed foam for even greater responsiveness & durability, providing optimal cushioning & energy return. Micro Gheel unit increases protection & stabilization. Blown rubber under the forefoot is lightweight yet incredibly responsive. Offset: 8 mm. Weight: 9.85 oz. .
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Innovative UA SpeedForm construction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction
Threadborne midfoot panel provides structure & distinct style
Engineered mesh used on the tongue & toe box to enhance fit & increase ventilation
Internal heel counter provides seamless, lightweight support & structure
